description:
With Raoh`s legend in shambles, tyranny and brutal suppression of revolts has grown worse than ever. Kosem`s son Rock, believing Raoh would come, returned to his village with the intent of joining the uprising, but is horror-stricken upon finding out about the death of his father and the collapse of Raoh`s legend. Rock decides to carry on Raoh`s legend himself, and gathers fellow soldiers to form Raoh`s Army. They boldly dare to challenge the Asuras, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rock, The Hero on Horseback! I Don`t Believe in Kenshiro!!
Rock, le cavalier sans peur ! Je ne crois pas en Kenshiro !!
馬上の勇士ロック! 俺はケンシロウを信じない!!
